perks: Role in the Galactic City
Offsite from any war zones
Highly technical role, working with data
Exposure to the other administrative Imperial divisions
details.jobDescription: Looking to replace the spy Alexsandry Kallus with a new agent, spend your days in the convieniently located communications division right in the heart of the Galactic City! The Job itself is simple, moderate and observe civilian communications for Imperial approved discussions. Any exceptions are to be tracked and logged for troopers to follow up on. Lots of opportunities for growth, including eventual transfer to the Imperial fleet to help search and tap into rebel communications. Low chance of being executed by the Emperor for incompetence as you won't directly interact with leadership
responsibilities: Check for Imperial approved communications only among civilians
Log exceptions for troopers to follow up on
Keep an eye out for rebel communications

title: Battle Station Operations Staff
location: DS-1 Death Star Mobile Battle Station

perks: Live and work aboard the Death Star!
Super secure, no chance of self destruction
Work in any of the eight major departments!
details.jobDescription: Battle Station Command is looking for more recruits to staff the DS-1 Death Star Mobile Battle Station. Live and work in the most luxurious role in the Imperial Military. DS-1 has eight major departments you can choose to work in (pending your prior experience), engineering, logistics, maintenance, medical, security, station defense, or technical support. Feeling stuck in your current role? Feel free to requisition a move to a new department. Note: successful applicants sign on for a 10 year term, once you board the DS-1 you will not be able to leave until your term is complete.
responsibilities: Manage day to day operations among the DS-1 Battle Station
Submit to a 10 year term among the DS-1
Prepare the DS-1 for planetary annihilation at a moment's notice
Applicants must be ready to defend the station should it be necessary

Redacted
Redacted

responsibilities: Redacted
Redacted
Redacted

perks: Cool Armor!
Guns!
Lots of friends!
Visit lots of planets!
details.jobDescription: Permanently recruiting: The Imperial Military is looking for more Storm Troopers, always. Apply to be one today! Accuracy in shooting not required.
responsibilities: Follow orders.
Follow orders.
Follow orders.
Follow orders.

perks: Coffee, in space!
Empirebucks is the parent company formerly know as Starbucks, with the imperial takeover you can happily support caffinating our troops.
Use the latest in espresso technology, our grounds press uses the same force as the Death Star's trash compactor!
Tons of growth opportunities to our 2,340,523,124,644 other branches throughout the galaxy.
details.jobDescription: Spend your days on the Death Star serving up the Empire's finest coffee to our loyal staff. Remember that since the shift from Starbucks to Empirebucks we only serve coffee the way the dark side approves, black with no sugar, this means your job is quite straight forward and easy! Absolutely no chance or risk of getting into a fight, unless you burn the beans on the Emperor's coffee, in which case Empirebucks takes no ownership over impending loss of life.
responsibilities: Brew fresh coffee daily, using only the darkest beans
Serve coffee the way the dark side intended - black
No smiling, but no frowning either, remember Empirebucks is meant to be a relaxing place to enjoy your sanctioned 10 minute break, just make sure you're not enjoying your break too much.

perks: Not every job on the Death Star needs to be in the military, try banking instead!
Contribute to the Empire's funding by skimming 25% off of everyone's paycheque, for the Empire!
Casual Fridays anyone?
Office life is the best life in our opinion!
details.jobDescription: ID Bank is here to serve our loyal customers, and of course, fund the Empire. By banking with ID Bank you directly contribute 25% of your income to the Empire with every paycheque, think of the karma you'll be racking up! Our Tellers are at the heart of our business, serving our loyal client base and ensuring that any complaints and recorded, shredded, and then incinerated, remember - you don't complain about the Empire, the Empire complains about you!
responsibilities: Process deposits daily
Take in customer complaints, log the ID of the complainers, then destroy them
Identify personnel who have saved more than the recommended allowance, transfer their funds to the Empire.

perks: Absolutely no food discounts
Listen to the same band playing in the McCantina, day in, day out
That grease smell really never leaves your clothes
Free ice cream to whoever can fix the machine
details.jobDescription: Get ready to say "I'm lovin' it!" to more than just your mandated devotion to the Empire – now YOU can serve it up to our fellow Imperials, fries and all.
responsibilities: Order intake, Imperial and otherwise
Superior time management - there are a lot of hungry troopers out there! Despite the fact this is space, everyone takes lunch at the same time
Daily cleaning of the Play Place

perks: Mandatorily enjoy daily leftovers (paycheques will be deducted accordingly for lost sales)
The best coffee in the whole Empire (SUCK IT, EMPIRE BUCKS)
Trooper helmet-style hairnets - feel like a badass!
Sleep easy at night knowing that the caffeine- and suger-induced high provided daily to the Trooper forces is really making a difference
details.jobDescription: An Imperial's work is never done, but at least we can enjoy a refreshing buzz of caffeine every day – and now you can join our front lines in serving it up! You will be tasked with monitoring all 170 locations across the Death Star, maintaining the server Droids and being seen by customers as little as possible. Any conflict of interest regarding Empire Bucks will result in immediate termination and reporting to Elite Imperial Forces for subsequent punishment on our authority.
responsibilities: Order intake, Imperial and otherwise
Actually, the Droids do most of the work, you just need to stay out of their way
Insert as many demeaning jabs as possible towards Empire Bucks when conversing with customers
Regular coffee runs to Sith meetings
Droid polishing
